Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting discrimination in employment based on pregnancy, childbirth, or a related medical condition.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Prohibiting discrimination in employment based on pregnancy, childbirth, or a related medical condition.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting discrimination in employment based on pregnancy, childbirth, or a related medical condition.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
